title: Bullet Angel Kai'sa missing interaction with Gun Goddess Miss Fortune
body: i noticed that gun goddess miss fortune has voice lines taunts towards bullet angel kai'sa. but bullet angel kai'sa does'nt have anything towards gun goddess miss fortune. i don't know if its intentional, since they're both in lore together and from the same universe, as well as wearing exo suits. I am asking because i'm trying to put together a super cool cosplay for bullet angel kai'sa and would love some voicelines for kai'sa. thanks!

replies.body:
It's intentional. For one, Bullet Angel Kai'Sa is an Epic-tier skin (1350), and they only rarely have unique quotes compared to the base; they largely will only have voice filtering effects.

On top of that, Bullet Angel Kai'Sa (and Kai'Sa in general) were released before Gun Goddess Miss Fortune, so even with the latter skin planned, if Kai'Sa was going to have quotes for her, they would've had them in with the release.

This is half true. The problem was that BA Kai'Sa released before GGMF, so if we had any lines targeting Miss Fortune it would have inadvertently leaked the release. Instead we put a little teaser in one of her emotes, where she's looking at a bounty board and GGMF's face comes up.

If you're curious, we're finding ways around this by having semi-specific interactions we can later tie to other characters. It's a bit of an imprecise science for now, but hopefully we'll have a fix for this one day.

Like for example if Mordekaiser had a line that could refer to Nidalee but later revealed to be about the Kumugu AD Assassin?

Could work, I think the best version of this was Swain teasing Kai'Sa by bringing up Kassadins daughter. That got the community so hype.

It's easier with VGU champs because you don't have to spoil anything like Aatrox taunting Akalis shroud or Irelia teasing Akalis new attitude before she was relaunched.

With new champs unless they're already linked to others in the lore harder to do for sure.
I was gonna say, base Kai'Sa has interaction lines with Miss Fortune, regardless of either's skin.

>
> This is half true. The problem was that BA Kai'Sa released before GGMF, so if we had any lines targeting Miss Fortune it would have inadvertently leaked the release. Instead we put a little teaser in one of her emotes, where she's looking at a bounty board and GGMF's face comes up.
> 
> If you're curious, we're finding ways around this by having semi-specific interactions we can later tie to other characters. It's a bit of an imprecise science for now, but hopefully we'll have a fix for this one day.

couldnt you guys like make the voicelines first dont ship them or put them on the pbe jsut save them somewhere when the specfice chmampion or skin gets released then just add the voiceline back. you can also do this with other champs and stuff that are about to be released

Kai'Sa has interaction lines with Miss Fortune; they play regardless of either's skin, but it's pretty obvious it's meant to be a reference to Bullet Angel/Gun Goddess.  She has three:

"You call those guns?"
"You're outgunned."
"Step back, red!"

Which don't make any sense for base Kai'Sa, since she doesn't have any guns, of course.
